=C2=A0 
Ok, i config wayback ma=
chine web.xml. Change all paths to folders, folders are created, automatic =
files in folders are created, path to arcs is set.
And i still get url is n=
ot in archive.
I try with just .arc files in arc folder, just compressed ar=
c.gz, just compressed arc.gzip, combinations, and no go the error is the sa=
me.
Is there the special format or something because i dont know what to do=
.
I put url from seed.txt that i use in heritrix for harvesting and other u=
rls from arc files.


And i try to install wayback 1.6.0. but it freezes on=
 tomcat7 in winXP and tomcat7 ubuntu.


________________________________
 F=
rom: Andrew Jackson <anj@...>
To: archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com=
 
Sent: Thursday, May 9, 2013 3:59 PM
Subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Embed =
Heritrix 1.14.4.
 


=C2=A0 
There are instructions for setting up a Waybac=
k instance here:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/wayback/Wayback+=
Installation+and+Configuration+Guide

Although please note my comment at th=
e bottom of the page about Wayback/JVM version compatibility.

Best wishes,=

Andy Jackson
